channel.title: Surface Tension RPG tank bug
channel.description:
When shooting the tank on Surface tension with the RPG and laser guidance on, the RPG won't explode on the tank and would do this random thing.
I don't even know how the tank didn't saw me, but that's another thing...
Video: [url]https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1IXw29h3kOg&feature=youtu.be[/url]
BONUS! On Surface Tension again on the mine field part, if you go to the fence all the way on the right (next to the hole you need to go to), you can see a hole in the map: [url]https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=97842231[/url]

item.title: Surface Tension RPG tank bug
item.dc:creator: awesome_ninja
item.description:
When shooting the tank on Surface tension with the RPG and laser guidance on, the RPG won’t explode on the tank and would do this random thing.

I don’t even know how the tank didn’t saw me, but that’s another thing…

Video:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1IXw29h3kOg&feature=youtu.be

BONUS!
On Surface Tension again on the mine field part, if you go to the fence all the way on the right (next to the hole you need to go to), you can see a hole in the map:
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=97842231
